sources.title: Gorilla Ship
sources.description: A drama from Mayfair Pictures Corporation. Don't bother downloading the h.264 file. The Cinepack file from which it is derived is smaller.

metadata.Plot: Philip Wells and his wife Helen argue a lot about the attention that Philip thinks Helen and his best friend, Dave Burton, are giving each other, but they all sail off together on Philips yacht, until "Gorilla"Larsen and his motley crew show up, scuttle the yacht, and marital-strife is no longer the issue of the day.
metadata.Actors: Ralph Ince, Vera Reynolds, Reed Howes
